movie.name: Raising Arizona
movie.plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

movie.name: Fargo
movie.plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

movie.name: The Big Lebowski
movie.plot: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

movie.name: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
movie.plot: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

movie.name: True Grit
movie.plot: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

movie.name: Unbroken
movie.plot: After a near-fatal plane crash in WWII, Olympian Louis Zamperini spends a harrowing 47 days in a raft with two fellow crewmen before he's caught by the Japanese navy and sent to a prisoner-of-war camp.
